p: Chemical composition of MpEO was determined by GC/MS analysis. The compounds, their percentages as well as their retention indices are listed in TableÂ 1. MpEO is a mixture with 26 compounds representing 98.17% of the total oil composition. The most abundant chemicals categories for MpEO are oxygenated monoterpenes (79.50%), followed by monoterpene hydrocarbons (16.23%) and sesquiterpene hydrocarbons (2.44%). The major components of MpEO are menthol (33.59%) and iso-menthone (33.00%). In lower amounts we found a variety of compounds including limonene (8.00%), piperitone (3.20%), 1,8-cineole (2.80%), linalool (2.64%), iso-pulegol (2.40%), caryophyllene (1.95%) and pulegone (1.60%).
